Uses of Package
org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter

Packages that use org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter
org.javasimon.javaee Java EE support for Simons contains Java EE components (servlet filter and EJB/CDI interceptor) that can be used or extended. 
org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter Package contains classes reporting slow HTTP requests - interface RequestReporter and various (default) implementations. 
 

Classes in org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter used by org.javasimon.javaee
RequestReporter
          RequestReporter interface .
 

Classes in org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter used by org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter
DefaultRequestReporter
          Reports significant splits (longer than 5% of the request) and list of all used stopwatches with their split counts.
